title: Will Gangplank be re-enabled BEFORE the tenth?
body: I want to be able to play him before the tenth to get the skin, but he is still disabled. Will he be re-enabled before the event ends?        R.I.P.{{champion:41}}

replies.body: Absolutely! You'll have plenty of time to play him before the event ends! He'll be re-enabled with Patch 5.15, which is tomorrow.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=yqbQWMxv,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-04T17:54:14.478+0000)
>
> Absolutely! You'll have plenty of time to play him before the event ends! He'll be re-enabled with Patch 5.15, which is tomorrow.

So I will be able to buy him then?
you dont buy gp, gp buys you.
Thanks a lot! (Super Excited that a rioter replied to me :)
Read the patch notes, he is coming back with this next update "the one going into effect tommorrow". Then people can spam him for the free skin.
i voted nope because i dont blieve the pirate lies of rito.
